Name: Tolling of bridges controlled or operated by the city of New York.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the tolling of bridges controlled or operated by the city of New York.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the council as follows:

Section 1. Title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new chapter 7 to read as follows: 
Chapter 7
Bridges
19-701  Tolls.  No tolls or other charges shall be imposed for vehicular or pedestrian traffic for the use of any bridge controlled or operated by the department.
Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately.

PH 
LS # 19
6.7.06, 12:30 pm
